#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
	char arr[1000];
	char arr1[1000];
	scanf("%s %s",arr,arr1);
	int hash[26];
	for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i)
		hash[i]=0;
	for (int i = 0; i < strlen(arr); ++i)
		hash[arr[i]-'a']++;
	for (int i = 0; i < strlen(arr1); ++i)
		if(hash[arr1[i]-'a'])
			hash[arr1[i]-'a']=0;
	for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i)
		if(hash[i])
			printf("%c%d",(char)(((int)'a')+i),hash[i]);	
	return 0;
}
